column4: got a question, this is my first time with Ubuntu, I've been weaned on Debian and Mandrake, when I installed Hoary, it didnt ask for a root password, I've tried ubuntu, root, null cant seem to find out what it is.  What is the default root password?
ok, but when I run a program from the gui that requires root privileges it asks for it
when it asks for your pass in the GUI, it means your password
